name: Orgoth the Relentless
desc:
Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die 3 times and have this card gain ATK/DEF equal to the total roll x 100 until the end of your opponent's turn. Then, if exactly 2 of the results were the same, apply the appropriate effect, or if all 3 of the results were the same, apply all of these effects.
● 1 or 2: This card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effect until the end of your opponent's turn.
● 3 or 4: Draw 2 cards.
● 5 or 6: This turn, this card can attack directly.
